Name: @ui_progression_global_modifier_name
Comments: Percentage increase to global experience (combat, tradeskill, mastery, territory)

Name: @ui_azoth_fasttravel_generalcost_reduction_name
Comments: Implemented as a reduction of the azoth base travel cost used in calculating total cost (set by stack config 'javelin.housing.fast-travel-settlement-cost')

Name: @ui_azoth_fasttravel_weight_reduction_name
Comments: Implemented as a reduction of the azoth base travel cost used in calculating total cost (set by stack config 'javelin.housing.fast-travel-settlement-cost')

Name: @ui_azoth_fasttravel_distance_reduction_name
Comments: Implemented as subtracting this value from the base cost, instead of setting it to 1

Name: @ui_azoth_crafting_effectiveness_modifer_name
Comments: These modifiers either increase or decrease based on their usage in code

Name: @ui_taxes_global_modifier_name
Comments: Percentage decrease to global taxes for members of that faction.

Name: @ui_crafting_refining_yield_modifier_name
Comments: Percentage bonus to global refining yield

Name: @ui_crafting_max_gs_bonus_name
Comments: GS bonus for crafting rolls (ceiling, not floor.)

Name: @ui_azoth_salt_yield_modifier_name
Comments: Percentage increase to yield from Azoth Salt gains

Name: @ui_pvp_track_exp_modifier_name
Comments: Percentage increase to experience gained in PvP Rewards track

Name: @ui_chance_consumable_not_used_name
Comments: Percentage chance to not consume a consumable on use.
Not approved for use, consider removing if will not be reworked

Name: @ui_faction_store_discount_modifier_name
Comments: Percentage decrease to costs for objects in the faction store
